div.p: GAY PRIDE TOOK PLACE AND WATTERS WAS THERE
♫ ♫ MR. NEWSOME, HAPPY GAY
PRIDE PARADE. >> GOOD, HUH.
>> FEEL GOOD. >> 44% OF AMERICANS NOW HAVE
THE SAME RIGHTS NOW WIFE AND I HAVE.
IT’S A GOOD THING. >> I’M BLACK AND I’M PROUD.
I’M GAY AND I’M PROUD. >> I LIKE THE PANTS.
I HAVE TO BE HONEST WITH YOU THE PANTS A LITTLE TIGHT.
>> NOT AL ALL. A LOT OF ROOM.
>> YOU ARE GOING TO BEHAVE YOURSELF TODAY.
>> I’M GOING TO TRY TO BEHAVE MYSELF TODAY.
>> I DON’T BELIEVE YOU FOR A MINUTE.
>> WE WILL FIND OUT WHEN YOU JOIN ME WE BEHAVE OURSELVES
TOGETHER. >> ARE YOU GUYS SURE YOU
DON’T LIKE GIRLS? ARE YOU SURE?
YOU STILL NEED THOSE PARADES EVEN THOUGH CAN YOU GET
MARRIED IN CALIFORNIA. >> THEY ARE IMPORTANT
BECAUSE PEOPLE ACTUALLY DO COME OUT OF THE CLOSET WHEN
THEY COME HERE. >> ARE YOU OUT OF THE
CLOSET. >> I HAVE BEEN OUT OF THE
CLOSET FOR MANY MUNICIPAL AT THIS POINT.
>> NO KIDDING? >> WHAT’S THE NEXT STEP IN
THE GAY RIGHTS MOVEMENT? DO YOU WANT A GAY PRESIDENT.
>> HELL YEAH. >> YOU DO?
>> YES. GAY WORLD.
EVERYONE WILL BE GAY. >> THEN WE CAN’T PROCREATE
THEN. >> OH WELL.
>> YOU GUYS WORK OUT? [ LAUGHTER ]
>> I’M GOING TO GO OUT ON A LIMB.
YOU LOOK A LITTLE PROMISCUOUS.
>> A LITTLE BIT. I CAN’T HELP IT THOUGH.
I’M SORRY. >> ROOM IS STARTING TO SPIN
REAL FAST. >> DOES IT MAKE YOU A BIGOT
IF YOU BELIEVE IN TRADITIONAL MARRIAGE.
>> I BELIEVE IN EQUALITY. >> CAN I HAVE A STRAIGHT
PRIDE PARADE IF I WANTED TO? >> I WOULD HAVE TO SAY.
NO. >> WHAT ABOUT IF YOU HAVE A
RELIGIOUS CONVICTION THAT SAYS MARRIAGE IS BETWEEN A
MAN AND A WOMAN. >> THAT KIND OF BELIEF HAS
BECOME INDICTED. EITHER GET WITH THE PROGRAM
OR GO AWAY WITH THE DINOSAURS.
>> KEEP IT CLOSE TO YOU. BUT DON’T SHOVE IT DOWN
SOMEONE’S THROAT. >> THIS IS A GAY PRIDE
PARADE SHOVING SOMETHING DOWN PEOPLE’S THROAT.
>> IT MIGHT BE. >> THE CEO OF MOZILLA
COMPANY LOST HIS JOB BECAUSE HE FOR TRADITIONAL MARRIAGE.
>> YES. THAT SUCKS SOMETIMES.
>> IS HE WEARING A DRESS. YEAH. >> YOU SHOULDN’T LOSE YOUR JOB.
YOU SHOULD BE SHAMED. >> YOU POPPED IT OFF.
I LIKE IT A GUY TAKES IT OFF. >> JUST TALKING TO YOU, THOUGH.
>> YEAH. >> YOU SEEM LIKE AN ENORMOUS
FACTOR FAN. >> YEAH.
>> BILL O’REILLY SAYS HELLO. >> GIVE HIM MY BEST.
TELL HIM TO LOVE HIS NEIGHBOR. >> HE DOES.
>> WHEN YOU COMING BACK ON "THE FACTOR."
>> I ALWAYS HAVE FUN ON "THE FACTOR."
>> DO YOU EVER WATCH BILL O’REILLY.
>> I LOVE WATCHING BILL O’REILLY.
>> DO YOU? >> I DO.
>> DO YOU GREAT DRESSED UP WHEN YOU WATCH "THE FACTOR."
>> A LITTLE. >> I DON’T LIKE FOX.
>> THIS IS FOX. >> SOMETIMES YOU LEAVE ME
BREATHLESS. >> ALL RIGHT.
HERE’S WATERS. YOU HAD A GOOD TIME.
>> I HAD A BLAST. >> THEY WERE ALL NICE.
NO PROBLEMS. WATERS IS RAPIDLY BECOMING ONE
OF THE MOST CONTROVERSIAL GUYS IN THE COUNTRY.
LAST WEEK HE HAD A STARRING ROLE ON THE PROGRAM "OUTNUMBERED"
SEEN AT NOON HERE. THE TOPIC, HILLARY CLINTON.
>> SHE NEED A SINGLE LADIES, I CALL THEM THE BEYONCE VOTERS,
THE SINGLE LADIES. OBAMA WON FROM THE SINGLE LADIES
BY 76% THE LAST TIME AND MADE UP
ABOUT A QUARTER OF THE ELECTORATE.
THEY DEPEND ON GOVERNMENT BECAUSE THEY ARE NOT DEPENDING
ON THEIR HUSBANDS. THEY NEED THINGS LIKE CONTRA
SEPG AND HEALTH CARE AND THEY WANT TO TALK ABOUT EQUAL PAY.
>> THEY DIDN’T LIKE THAT. >> I WAS IN BIG TROUBLE BECAUSE
MY MOTHER EMAILED ME AND SAID JESSE YOU’RE SO INSENSITIVE.
MY MOTHER SAID THAT. WHAT I WAS TRYING TO SAY I
WASN’T TALKING ABOUT BEYONCE AT ALL, I WAS TALKING ABOUT THE
SONG "SINGLE LADIES." WHAT I WAS SAYING SINGLE WOMEN,
SINGLE LADIES DEPEND ON
GOVERNMENT MUCH MORE THAN MARRIED WOMEN AND THE STATS SHOW
THAT. THEY DEPEND ON THEM FOR FOOD
STAMPS, WELFARE, HOUSING ASSISTANCE, MEDICAID AND HILLARY
NEEDS THOSE SINGLE LADIES IF SHE’S GOING TO WIN IN 2016.
>> BUT IF YOU MENTION THE WORD BEYONCE --
>> YOU CAN’T DO THAT. >> YOU CAN’T.
BECAUSE THE LEFT GOES WILD. WHY THIS IS I DON’T KNOW.
I’M TRYING TO FIGURE THIS OUT. >> I WAS CALLED RACIST AND I
SHOULDN’T HAVE SAID CONTRACEPTION.
>> HAS YOUR MOTHER DISOWNED YOU. >> NO.
>> SHE NEVER LIKED YOU TO BEGIN WITH.
>> ARE YOU ON TONIGHT, JESSE.
WHAT TIME. >> I SAID YOU CAN WATCH THE
WHOLE SHOW. I’M ON AT 8:49.
>> YOU WEREN’T BEING NASTY. >> NO.
>> YOU WERE TAKING THE STATISTICS THAT SAY SINGLE
LADIES MOSTLY BECAUSE THEY HAVE CHILDREN OUT OF WEDLOCK AND THEN
THEY, FATHER, HUSBAND DOESN’T SUPPORT THEM SO THEY HAVE TO.
>> OR EVEN IF THEY ARE SINGLE WITHOUT KIDS OUT OF WEDLOCK THEY
ARE STILL ON DEPENDENT ON
GOVERNMENT MORE THAN MARRIED
WOMEN. >> THE STATS BEAR THAT OUT.
>> WHAT DO THE STATS SAY ABOUT BEYONCE.
I DON’T THINK SHE NEEDS GOVERNMENT ASSISTANCE.
>> I THINK SHE’S DOING QUITE WELL.
>> I WON’T SAY ANYTHING ABOUT CONTRACEPTION BECAUSE I DON’T
KNOW WHAT I’M TALKING ABOUT. JESSE WATERS.
HATE HIM IF YOU DARE. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY,
CONSERVATIVE ANGER.
CONSERVATIVE ANGER.THE TIP MOMENTS AWAY.

COPD includes chronic
bronchitis and emphysema.
